data.message: Phase 4.3 Rules Audit - Pivot from quantity to enforcement: Audited 57 rules bouncer-style. Result: 6 gold (enforce now), 5 roadmap (enforce later), 44 fluff (demoted to candidates/). Created enforcement_patterns.json with actual regex. Added 6 enforcement evals. Committed 2788542.
